data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Birbhum. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Birbhum, West Bengal, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Birbhum, West Bengal, India. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Father, bless the county of Birbhum with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 38,526 believers in the county of Birbhum to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Mallah (Muslim traditions) people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
the county of Birbhum has (about) 38,526 people who know Jesus, 42,496 people who know about him culturally, and 3,421,378 people who are far from Jesus.
Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Birbhum, West Bengal, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Birbhum, West Bengal, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
